item.title: FEEDER PILLARS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Robust outdoor feeder pillars for reliable power distribution. IP55 rated, modular design allows customizable configurations up to 4000A. Ensures safe, weatherproof power control in diverse applications.
item.content:encoded:
Whenever Power needs to be controlled, monitored, distributed in outdoor applications like in a transformer yard or on the terrace of buildings or in group housing projects spread out over a large space and so on, Feeder Pillar Panels or Outdoor Kiosks are used. These can be supplied in Application Industry, Buildings, OEM , Process Control Operational Voltage 415 VAC or as per network voltage Suitable for Outdoor / Indoor Installation up to ambient temperature of 50 deg. C powder coated CRCA/GAL-Alu. Sheet Steel or in Stainless Steel as required. The Panels are manufactured generally to IP55 clause of protection to ensure no ingress of water, dust or vermin with a canopy on top. While the outside of the Panel is welded, the IPCE Outdoor Panels retain the modular advantage in the insides, enhancing the flexibility, safety and versatility of the interiors of the Panels.

Rated Operation Voltage 3Phase, 415 V AC
Rated Current Up to 4000 Amp
Dry Power Frequency Withstand Voltage 2.5KV For 1 Minute
Short Time Current 65 KA
Temperature rise 40°C above Ambient 45°C
Form of Separation 3b / 4b
Degree of Protection IP 55 / IP 65
Metal Sheet Thickness 3mm / 2mm / 1.6mm
External Surface Protection Epoxy Powder Polymerized at High Temperature
Painting Thickness > 60 micron
Bus bars Aluminium / Copper

item.title: MOTOR CONTROL CENTRE
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Modular Motor Control Centers (MCCs) with customizable dimensions, supporting diverse starter types (DOL, Star Delta, VFD, Soft Starters). Intelligent features, IP55/IP65 protection, and communication protocols (Modbus, IEC 61850, SCADA) for various industrial applications.
item.content:encoded:
The complete modularity of this system allows maximum freedom when designing Motor Control Centers. The physical dimensions of each compartment can be varied in width, height and depth to accommodate the various space requirements for different starter types, viz., Direct on Line, Star Delta, Soft Start, Autotransformer Starters, Variable SpeedDrives, etc. The system will also allow the design of intelligent Motor Control Centers which integrate electronic and programmable devices connected to a network.

PRODUCT RANGE
  • DOL / Star Delta Starter Panels
  • VFD Panels
  • Soft Starter Panels
  • Process Control Panels
Application Industry, Buildings, OEM
Operational Voltage 415 VAC
Degree of Protection Upto IP55 Outdoor duty / IP65
Current Ratings Upto 2000A 75kA Al. / 100kA Cu. Busbar
Configuration Fixed
Type of Starters DOL/Star Delta/VFD/Soft Starter/ Intelligent Starters/SCADA Compatible Starters.
Communication features IMCC, Modbus RTU/ASCII, IEC 61850 and SCADA Compatible
Busbar Type Alu / Cu
Protections Finger Proof
Flexible Switchgears ABB / Schneider / L&T / Siemens / Havells / C&S
Form of Separation 2b / 3b / 4b
Busbar Arrangement Interleaved Type
Environment Suitable for Outdoor / Indoor Installation up to ambient temperature of 50 deg. C

item.title: AUTOMATIC POWER FACTOR CORRECTION PANEL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Automatically optimize power factor, reducing energy waste and costs. Our APFC panels improve system efficiency and performance, available in various configurations and KVAR ratings to suit diverse industrial and commercial needs. Contact us for a customized solution.
item.content:encoded:
In industry most of the load is inductive in nature which results in lagging power factor that is why there is loss and wastage of energy which results in high power bills and heavy penalties from electricity boards. If the load is uneven it is very difficult to maintain unity power factor. To overcome this difficulty APFC panel is used which maintains unity P.F. The power factor can be maintained by installing Automatic Power Factor Controller(APFC).

ADVANTAGES
  • Reduced demand charges by compensation of non-useful energy
  • Increased load carrying capacity of existing system
  • Reduced power system losses & reduced carbon footprint
CATEGORY
  • Contactor based APFC
  • Thyristorized RTPFC
  • Panels with detuned Reactors
Application Industry, Buildings, OEM, Control
Operational Voltage 415 VAC or as per network voltage
Degree of Protection Upto IP55 Outdoor duty / IP65
KVAR Ratings From 50 kVAR APFC to 2000 kVAR
Configuration Fixed Type
Type of Switching Method Contactor Based Switching Thyristor Based Switching
Capacitor type Normal,Heavy Duty, Super Heavy duty with cylindrical and box type options
Reactor type H-Class- 5.6%, 7%,14% or other Tuning/ Detuning rating on request
Protections Finger Proof
Flexible Switchgears ABB / Schneider / L&T / Havells
Form of Separation 2b / 3b / 4b
Capacitors Make Havells / Schneider / Neptune Ducati/ L&T
Environment Suitable for Outdoor / Indoor Installation up to ambient temperature of 50 deg. C

item.title: AUTOMATIC MAIN FAILURE PANEL
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bafna Electric's Automatic Main Failure Panel (AMFP) ensures seamless power transfer during mains outages, maximizing uptime. Featuring robust construction, it accommodates fuses/circuit breakers and multiple circuits for extended service life. Minimize disruptions with reliable power switching.
item.content:encoded:
Auto mains failure panel is a component of the electric supply system which facilitates the division of electric power feed into subsidiary circuits. Our supplied auto mains failure panel is made from corrosion resistant metallic sheets. AMF board and ATS panels monitor the incoming AC mains supply, activate the standby generator when mains power fails, and make an automatic electrical transfer of the building’s load from the mains to the generating set. When the mains supply returns, the ATS panel controls a return to the mains supply and shuts down the generator after a suitable cooling run.

 

Features:

  • Accommodates fuses and circuit breakers
  • Optimally sized to accommodate multiple electric circuits
  • Longer service life

item.title: AUTO SYNCHRONIZATION PANEL WITH LOAD MANAGEMENT FOR DG & MAINS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bafna Electric's automated DG synchronization panel optimizes power distribution, maximizing DG set utilization and fuel efficiency. Features include auto load sharing, AMF functions, and PLC/software control with Modbus and IEC 61850 communication. Rated up to 2000A, IP65 protection.
item.content:encoded:
DG Synchronization Panels are based on Auto/Manual sharing, Auto Synchronising, Auto KW & KVAR sharing and Load dependent start stop features. Changing of scheme are made through PLC & software which work in tandem with the Generator Control Package Relay that also takes care of power monitoring, communication , display as well as protection. For any type of load addition or reduction, manual intervention with respect to DG set operation is not required. However, in case of emergency, manual override is possible. Special programs using Real Time Clock (RTC) are possible. With this facility, along with KW dependent programs; day, date and time dependent programmers are possible. Because of KW dependent load sharing, optimum utilization of DG sets are possible. This increases DG sets efficiency and saves lot of fuel. DG Sets are always run with about 80% load factor, where we get maximum efficiency of DG Sets.

Application Industry, Buildings, OEM
Operational Voltage 415 VAC
Degree of Protection Upto IP55 Outdoor duty / IP65
Current Ratings Upto 2000A 50kA Al. /  Cu. Busbar
Compatible Relays DEIF, CUMMINS, WOODWARD
Configuration Fixed Type
Interlocking Options PLC Interlocking / Hard Wire Interlocking
Logics implementation Auto Load Sharing , AMF Functions, Star time optimization.
Communication features Modbus RTU/ASCII, IEC 61850 and SCADA Compatible
Busbar Type Alu / Cu
Protections Finger Proof / Arc guard protected
Flexible Switchgears ABB / Schneider / L&T / Siemens / Hager
Form of Separation 2b / 3b / 4b
Form of Separation Interleaved Type
Environment Suitable for Outdoor / Indoor Installation up to ambient temperature of 50 deg. C

item.title: AUTOMATIC TRANSFER SWITCH PANELS
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bafna Electric's Automatic Transfer Switch Panels ensure uninterrupted power by seamlessly transferring between mains and generator. Featuring corrosion-resistant construction, they accommodate fuses/breakers and offer optimized circuit capacity for extended service life.
item.content:encoded:
Auto mains failure panel is a component of the electric supply system which facilitates the division of electric power feed into subsidiary circuits. Our supplied auto mains failure panel is made from corrosion resistant metallic sheets. AMF board and ATS panels monitor the incoming AC mains supply, activate the standby generator when mains power fails, and make an automatic electrical transfer of the building’s load from the mains to the generating set. When the mains supply returns, the ATS panel controls a return to the mains supply and shuts down the generator after a suitable cooling run.

 

Features:

  • Accommodates fuses and circuit breakers
  • Optimally sized to accommodate multiple electric circuits
  • Longer service life
